entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Belleville

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches overnight. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
